title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [NEW LAUNCH] Kiro powers: Empower agents with specialized expertise (DVT343)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [新发布] Kiro powers：为代理赋予专业能力 (DVT343)
abstract: Excited about the launch of Kiro powers? This Lightning Talk will present an overview of how the powers dynamically transform AI agents into experts.
abstract_cn: 对Kiro powers的发布感到兴奋吗？本次闪电演讲将概述这些powers如何动态地将AI代理转变为专家。
